Lyrics : This is all hands on deck / Calling out to lost boys and girls / I'm gettin' tired of the disrespect / We won't stop 'til we rule the world / It's our time, we up next (next, next) / Our sail's about to be set (set, set) / They ain't seen nothing yet / Tell 'em who's in charge so they don't forget / / What's my name? / What's my name? (Uma) / Say it louder / What's my name? / What's my name? (Uma) / Feel the power / No one's gonna stop us / Soon the world will be ours / What's my name? / What's my name? / What's it? What's it? / Say it loud / / (Uma, Uma) / All eyes on me, lemme see 'em / (Uma, Uma) / What's it? What's it? / Say it, say it / (Uma-ah-ah-ah) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Um) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Uma) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Um) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Uma) / (Uma) / / I'm the new kid in town / I'm off the block, you know who I am / I don't bend the knee or back down / Your past has passed, there's no second chance / It's my time, I'm up next (next, next) / My mom's as mean as it gets (gets, gets) / So, say my name or say less / I don't follow rules, with all disrespect / / What's my name? / What's my name? (Uma) / Say it louder / What's my name? / What's my name? (Uma) / Feel the power / No one's gonna stop us / Soon the world will be ours (ours) / What's my name? / What's my name? / What's it? What's it? / Say it, say it / / You know what they say, "Bad girls have all the fun" (uh-huh) / All these chicks duplicates, I'm a one-of-one (yeah) / And I'm troublesome / Little Misbehave / Look at all your VK's, they're all middle-aged / Hey, maybe I can be the new blood / It was rough growing up, but I ain't givin' up / They're all washed up / I'm the next wave / From the cradle to the grave, I'm a renegade / / What's my name? / What's my name? (Uma) / Say it louder / What's my name? / What's my name? (Red) / Feel the power / No one's gonna stop us / Soon the world will be ours (no one's gonna stop us, baby) / What's my name? / What's my name? / What's it? What's it? / Say it, say it (say it loud) / / (Uma, Uma) / All eyes on me, lemme see 'em (ooh) / (Uma, Uma) / What's it? What's it? / Say it, say it / (Uma, Uma) ooh, say it louder (what's my name?) / (Uma, Uma) What's my name? What's my name? / Ooh, say it louder / What's it? What's it? / Say it, say it (oh) / / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Um) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Uma) / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Um) say, that's my name, that's my name / (Uma, Uma, la-la-Uma) / Uma
